projects.title: Teknolojik Yemekler
projects.description: Teknolojik Yemekler is a single-page React application that offers a user interface for ordering pizza. With a focus on intuitive experience and user-friendly design, this project was developed to demonstrate independent working skills and technical presentation ability.

projects.title: Login Page
projects.description: This is a simple login page developed using React. It provides a clean and user-friendly interface where users can log in with their email and password. With basic validation and error handling, this page serves as a foundational example for learning form handling and component structure in React.

footer.title: Send me a message!
footer.description: Do you have a question, suggestion, or just want to say hi? Let's talk.
